creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: horned red demon with fangs dressed in priest's black robe; demon holds gong and inscribed paper in PL hand, striker in PR; bushy hair, clawed feet
inscription: On the center of image: 万人講 {Manninkō}
markings: Japanese inscription on R side when rolled; also on R side when rolled: [ONI]; rectangular relief seal R side when rolled
title: Demon Reciting Buddhist Prayers
